title: Merge a Branch
description: Git is a popular version control system that allows developers to collaborate on projects efficiently. One of the key features of Git is the ability to merge branches. Merging a branch allows you to combine changes from one branch into another, making it easier to manage changes and collaborate with others.

meta.title: Merge a Branch: A Git Collaboration Essentials
meta.description: Learn how to merge branches in Git, a crucial skill for collaborative software development.
meta.keywords: version control, git labs, branch, git, collaboration, git playground, merge

verify.name: Verify for successful merge
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 合并分支
i18n.description: Git是一个流行的版本控制系统，它允许开发人员在项目上高效协作。Git的关键特性之一是能够合并分支。合并分支可让你将一个分支中的更改合并到另一个分支中，从而更轻松地管理更改并与他人协作。

meta.title: 合并分支：Git协作基础
meta.description: 学习如何在Git中合并分支，这是协作软件开发的一项关键技能。
meta.keywords: 版本控制, Git实验室, 分支, Git, 协作, Git游乐场, 合并

verify.name: 验证合并是否成功
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
